info.description:
This REST API provides searchable access to information about geographical names in the province of British Columbia, including name status and details about the corresponding geographic feature. 

Please note that you may experience issues when submitting requests to the delivery or test environment if using this [OpenAPI specification](https://github.com/bcgov/api-specs) in other API console viewers.
info.title: BC Geographical Names Web Service - REST API

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

get.description: Gets a list of all feature categories used by the BC Geographical Names Information System (BCGNIS).  Note: there are three levels of classification in the BCGNIS feature taxonomy: classes, categories and types.  A type is a subset of a category, and a category is a subset of a class.

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

get.description: Gets a list of all feature classes used by the BC Geographical Names Information System (BCGNIS).  Note: there are three levels of classification in the BCGNIS feature taxonomy: classes, categories and types.  A type is a subset of a category, and a category is a subset of a class.

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

get.description: Gets a list of all feature types used by the BC Geographical Names Information System (BCGNIS).  Note: there are three levels of classification in the BCGNIS feature taxonomy: classes, categories and types.  A type is a subset of a category, and a category is a subset of a class.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for a feature
parameters.name: featureId

200.description: Information about the feature with the specified featureId (XML format only)

404.description: The feature with the given featureId doesn't exist

get.description: Get information about the geographical feature with the specified featureId.
get.summary: Get a feature by its featureId

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

get.description: Gets a list of all name authorities responsible for naming decisions of the geographical names in the BC Geographical Names Information System (BCGNIS)

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

parameters.description: Defines the earliest date (YYYY-MM-DD format) of the change time window for the search
parameters.name: fromDate

parameters.description: Defines the latest date (YYYY-MM-DD format) of the change time window for the search
parameters.name: toDate

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.
parameters.name: featureClass

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.
parameters.name: featureCategory

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
parameters.name: featureType

parameters.description: The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
parameters.name: outputSRS

parameters.description: A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
parameters.name: embed

parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
parameters.name: outputStyle

parameters.description: The number of search results to return (1-200)
parameters.name: itemsPerPage

parameters.description: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
parameters.name: startIndex

200.description: A list of names matching the search criteria

400.description: A required parameter is missing or invalid

get.description: Search for information about geographical names which have changed most recently within a specified time window.  Changes may include status cupdates and metadata corrections.
get.summary: Search for names with metadata changes in a given period

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

parameters.description: The number of days used to define the time window of naming decisions to search.  The number is interpreted as searching for 'names affected by decisions within the last X days'.
parameters.name: days

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.
parameters.name: featureClass

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.
parameters.name: featureCategory

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
parameters.name: featureType

parameters.description: The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
parameters.name: outputSRS

parameters.description: A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
parameters.name: embed

parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
parameters.name: outputStyle

parameters.description: The number of search results to return (1-200)
parameters.name: itemsPerPage

parameters.description: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
parameters.name: startIndex

200.description: A list of names matching the search criteria

400.description: A required parameter is missing or invalid

get.description: Search for information about geographical names affected by naming 'decisions' made by the BC Geographical Names Office (naming authority) within the last X days.
get.summary: Search for names affected by recent naming decision

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

parameters.description: The year in which to search for names affected by naming decisions'.
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.
parameters.name: featureClass

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.
parameters.name: featureCategory

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
parameters.name: featureType

parameters.description: The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
parameters.name: outputSRS

parameters.description: A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
parameters.name: embed

parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
parameters.name: outputStyle

parameters.description: The number of search results to return (1-200)
parameters.name: itemsPerPage

parameters.description: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
parameters.name: startIndex

200.description: A list of names matching the search criteria

400.description: A required parameter is missing or invalid

get.description: Search for information about geographical names affected by naming 'decisions' made by the BC Geographical Names Office (naming authority) in a given year.
get.summary: Search for names affected by naming decisions in a given year

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

parameters.description: A geographic bounding box defining the search area.  Must be specified as a string of the form 'minLongitude,minLatitude,maxLongitude,maxLatitude' (WGS84). e.g. -119,49,-118,50
parameters.name: bbox

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.
parameters.name: featureClass

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.
parameters.name: featureCategory

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
parameters.name: featureType

parameters.description: The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
parameters.name: outputSRS

parameters.description: A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
parameters.name: embed

parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
parameters.name: outputStyle

parameters.description: The number of search results to return (1-200)
parameters.name: itemsPerPage

parameters.description: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
parameters.name: startIndex

200.description: A list of names matching the search criteria

400.description: A required parameter is missing or invalid

get.description: Search for information about geographical names that correspond to features within a geographic bounding box.  Various options and filter parameters are available to refine the search.

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

parameters.description: A geographic coordinate specifying the centre point of the search area.  Must be specified as a string of the form 'longitude,latitude' (WGS84).  e.g. -120,51
parameters.name: featurePoint

parameters.description: A radius (in kilometres) around the centre point.
parameters.name: distance

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.
parameters.name: featureClass

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.
parameters.name: featureCategory

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
parameters.name: featureType

parameters.description: The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
parameters.name: outputSRS

parameters.description: A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
parameters.name: embed

parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
parameters.name: outputStyle

parameters.description: The number of search results to return (1-200)
parameters.name: itemsPerPage

parameters.description: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
parameters.name: startIndex

200.description: A list of names matching the search criteria

400.description: A required parameter is missing or invalid

get.description: Search for information about geographical names that correspond to features within a geographic area defined by a centre point and a radius.  Various options and filter parameters are available to refine the search.
get.summary: Search near to a geographic point

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

parameters.description: A filter to search based on the the text of the name itself.  Use the asterisk (*) as a wildcard character.  For example 'vancouv*'
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: If the 'name' parameter is specified, 'exactSpelling' specifies whether to include only names that exactly match the search text (exactSpelling=1), or whether to also include names with similar spellings (exactSpelling=0)
parameters.name: exactSpelling

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'class'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureClassCode' value returned by the /featureClasses resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature classes be included.
parameters.name: featureClass

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'category'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureCategoryCode' value returned by the /featureCategories resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature categories be included.
parameters.name: featureCategory

parameters.description: A filter to limit the search to names associated with features of a certain 'type'  The value of this parameter should be a 'featureTypeCode' value returned by the /featureTypes resource, or an asterisk (*) to request that all feature types be included
parameters.name: featureType

parameters.description: The distance to move the accessPoint away from the curb and towards the inside of the parcel (in metres). Ignored if locationDescriptor not set to accessPoint.
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries.
parameters.name: outputSRS

parameters.description: A flag to indicate whether to embed the corresponding 'feature' into each matching name
parameters.name: embed

parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
parameters.name: outputStyle

parameters.description: The number of search results to return (1-200)
parameters.name: itemsPerPage

parameters.description: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)
parameters.name: startIndex

200.description: A list of names matching the search criteria

400.description: A required parameter is missing or invalid

parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to include with each matching name a succinct list of attributes (summary), or a comprehensive list of attributes (detail)
parameters.name: outputStyle

parameters.description: The number of search results to return (1-200)
parameters.name: itemsPerPage

parameters.description: The index of the first record to be returned (>= 1)

200.description: A list of names matching the search criteria

400.description: A required parameter is missing or invalid

get.description: Search for information about geographical names by the text of the name itself.  The response will include both official and unofficial names.  Various options and filter parameters are available to refine the search.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for a name
parameters.name: nameId

parameters.description: The format of the output.
parameters.name: outputFormat

200.description: Information about the name with the specified nameId

404.description: The name with the given nameId doesn't exist, or the output format is invalid.

get.description: Get information about the geographical name with the specified nameId.
get.summary: Get a name by its nameId
